function.description:
Returns a randomized value based on the optional parameter value.
If an integer argument N is provided the return value is a random integer between 0 and N. If a list argument L is provided it is a random entry from the list. If no parameter is provided, a random floating point number between 0 and 1 will be generated.

example.title: Roll a 6-sided dice:
example.p: Note: the + 1 is needed, because the result of random is 0 to 6, but not including 6.
